item.title: IBM BigFix Inventory
item.description: Community Notes Source Note CISAGov To verify if your instance is affected, go to the lib subdirectory of the tool (BESClient/LMT/SAPTOOL and BESClient/LMT/VMMAN) and check what version of log4j is included. Version is included in the name of the library. Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-15 13:48:56 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable. Updated community note.
